From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia




2023 Indian filmPanch Kriti Five ElementsDirected bySannjoy BhargvStory byHaripriyaa Bharggav, Sannjoy Bhargv and Kumar RakeshProduced byHaripriyaa Bharggav, Sannjoy BhargvStarring
Brijendra Kala
Tanmay Chaturvedi
Umesh Bajpai
Kurangi Vijayshri Nagraj
Mahi Soni
Sagar Wahi
Devyani Chaubey
Purva Parag
Sarika Bahroliya
Ravi Chauhan
CinematographyYogendra TripathiEdited bySunil Yadav, Arun D.YadavProductioncompanyUbon Vision Pvt LtdRelease date
25 August 2023 (2023-08-25)
Running time124 minsCountryIndiaLanguageHindiBudget₹33 croreBox office₹35.48 crore[1]
Panch Kriti Five Elements[2] is a 2023 Indian Hindi-language drama film,[3] written and directed by Sannjoy Bhargv and produced by Haripriyaa Bharggav[4] and Sannjoy Bhargv[5] under the banner of Ubon Vision Pvt Ltd.[6] The film stars Brijendra Kala,[7] Umesh Bajpai, Sagar Wahi, Purva Parag, Mahi Soni and Ravi Chauhan will also be seen in the film.[8][9]
It is scheduled for theatrical release in  25 August 2023.[10]


Synopsis[edit]
Panch Kriti Five Elements[11] is a film consisting of five captivating and interconnected stories set in the charming town of Chanderi.[12][13] Through a unique blend of storytelling, each story stands alone while also being intertwined by a common thread. These startling, unique, and mysterious tales offer a thought-provoking experience with a compelling message.[14][15]

Cast[edit]
Brijendra Kala as Pandit Ji[16]
Tanmay Chaturvedi as Mukesh
Umesh Bajpai as Morya Ji
Kurangi Vijayshri Nagraj as Sakhi
Mahi Soni as Mahi[17]
Sagar Wahi as Sunny[18]
Devyani Chaubey as Ratna
Purva Parag as Kusum
Sarika Bahroliya as Rajani
Ravi Chauhan as Rajani Father
